review: Lodine (etodolac):Very good. But it wasn’t in the hospital’s formulary. I had to use my own.
Lodine (etodolac):Not sure it really gets to the pain, any more then aleve.  Will try each for a day or two at a time and see if there is a benefit of one over the other.
